DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant on behalf of a signed in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute assignments
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant on behalf of a signed in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute assignments
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute assignments
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.
